meta.title: Baldwin Community Schools

font.b: The Landing Page for our remote learning plan and activities will be Monday, April 20, 2020.

p.span: The Baldwin Community School's Board of Education's remote board meeting will be Tuesday, April 21, 2020.
Public Viewers can watch the board meeting via a Youtube livestream at https://bit.ly/bcsboardmeeting

span.a: Baldwin Community Schools Continuity of Education Plan
Baldwin Community Schools COLP Approval Certification

font-size: 12pt; font-family: trebuchet ms, geneva, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif; color: #000000;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: trebuchet ms, geneva, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif; color: #000000;
span.span: This website is designed to give you important and useful information about our schools, curriculum, and programs and provide links to other related information not available on this site. Baldwin is proud of the ever increasing strength of our educational programs.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: trebuchet ms, geneva, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif; color: #000000;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: trebuchet ms, geneva, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif; color: #000000;
span.span: Our efforts to prepare students for life and for college have resulted in the creation of the Baldwin Promise. The Baldwin Promise means that Baldwin High School graduates who meet program guidelines will have college tuition paid for or receive up to $5,000 per year for up to four years toward tuition costs at Michigan Colleges and Universities. See the Baldwin Promise link for more details.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: trebuchet ms, geneva, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif; color: #000000;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: trebuchet ms, geneva, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.data-mce-style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif; color: #000000;

div.span:
If you are looking for information you cannot find here, do not hesitate to call us and ask for assistance. We are proud of our school district and the more you learn about us, the more you will agree. Please feel free to send us your comments and suggestions on this site. We truly want this to be the site you turn to for school and community information.
_________________________________________________________________
